meta.notes: Racial Extras for Fate Core Skyrim. Passive is always-on; upgrades unlock at act conclusions.

races.name: Nord
races.passive: Cold-blooded stubbornness: once per session, gain +2 to defend against fear, intimidation, or supernatural dread.
races.compel_hook: Pride and prejudice can blind you to allies or nuance.

upgrades.act_2: Snowborn: ignore one cold/weather complication per session.
upgrades.act_4: Unbroken Will: once per session, clear a mental stress box after a compel.

races.name: Breton
races.passive: Magic-resilient: once per session, gain +2 to defend against a magical effect.
races.compel_hook: Arcane politics follow you; people assume you’re ‘mixed up’ in magic.

upgrades.act_2: Spell-Knit: after you defend vs magic, gain a boost 'Residual Ward' on success.
upgrades.act_4: Counterweave: once per session, cancel a minor magical advantage with a Lore Overcome.

races.name: Imperial
races.passive: Voice of Empire: once per session, gain +2 to Rapport in a negotiation with authority, soldiers, or officials.
races.compel_hook: Seen as the Empire’s agent; Stormcloaks (and Thalmor) watch you.

upgrades.act_2: Logistics Mind: once per session, declare a useful supply/contact in a civil setting.
upgrades.act_4: Command Presence: once per scene, allies gain +1 on a roll if they follow your plan (describe it).

races.name: Redguard
races.passive: Adrenaline Rush: once per session, gain +2 to an Athletics or Fight Overcome when speed or swordwork matters.
races.compel_hook: Hot blood: you answer insult with action.

upgrades.act_2: Desert Endurance: ignore one fatigue/exhaustion complication per session.
upgrades.act_4: Sword-Singer Echo: once per session, reroll a Fight roll when defending an oath.

races.name: Altmer (High Elf)
races.passive: Highborn Sorcery: once per session, gain +2 to Create Advantage using Lore with magic, wards, or enchantment.
races.compel_hook: People assume Thalmor ties; the Thalmor assume *ownership.*

upgrades.act_2: Arcane Reserve: once per session, take +2 on a second magical roll in the same scene.
upgrades.act_4: Dominion Spotlight: once per session, force a Thalmor complication into a scene (they show up). Gain a Fate point.

races.name: Bosmer (Wood Elf)
races.passive: Hunter’s Instinct: once per session, gain +2 to Notice/Survival when tracking or spotting an ambush.
races.compel_hook: The wild calls; civilization rules feel ‘optional.’

upgrades.act_2: Woods-Wise: ignore one wilderness navigation obstacle per session.
upgrades.act_4: Predator’s Patience: once per session, when you act from hidden position, gain an extra boost on success.

races.name: Dunmer (Dark Elf)
races.passive: Ashborn Resolve: once per session, gain +2 to resist pain, fear, or despair (Will).
races.compel_hook: Outsider stigma; old grudges with Nords can ignite.

upgrades.act_2: Ancestor Whispers: once per session, ask the GM one question about a ruin/ancient site; get a useful hint.
upgrades.act_4: Fire & Ash: once per session, gain +2 on an Attack that uses fire, ash, or destructive magic.

races.name: Orc (Orsimer)
races.passive: Berserker Focus: once per session, gain +2 to Overcome using Physique when breaking, lifting, or enduring harm.
races.compel_hook: People judge you by fear; you may answer accordingly.

upgrades.act_2: Stronghold Ties: once per session, declare an Orc contact or safehouse in a hold.
upgrades.act_4: Berserker Rage: once per session, turn a tie on an Attack into a success (but take a mild consequence).

races.name: Khajiit
races.passive: Cat’s Grace: once per session, gain +2 to Stealth or Burglary when slipping through tight spaces or crowds.
races.compel_hook: Prejudice + suspicion; guards hassle you first.

upgrades.act_2: Moon-Sugar Network: once per session, declare a rumor, fence, or black-market lead.
upgrades.act_4: Nine Lives: once per session, downgrade a consequence by one step if you escape the scene.

races.name: Argonian
races.passive: Marsh-Born: once per session, gain +2 to Athletics/Survival when swimming, diving, or resisting poison/disease.
races.compel_hook: Seen as ‘other’; your loyalty is questioned by everyone.

upgrades.act_2: Histsense: once per session, you may detect a lie or hidden fear in conversation (ask the GM what’s ‘off’).
upgrades.act_4: Toxic Resilience: once per session, ignore a poison/disease consequence for the rest of the scene.
